game.name: Sir Bottomtight
game.description:
The highly thrilled and addictive action-packed challenge is out! Where are you boys? Join Sir Bottomtight and be prepared to guide a wonderful character on his first and difficult adventure! Hey! He cannot come across the jungle alone since the cool man needs your help. Click the play button, grab his gun and get ready to protect him against a horde of dangerous enemies! Be careful as the powerful inca warriors and crazy bats are waiting for him!

Put your fingers on the mouse or tap the screen of your mobile phone to control him reach the hidden treasure in the jungle! Shoot all the monsters that you see along the way, as well as grab as many golden masks and power-ups as you can to boost your score. Make sure that he runs safely through the jungle while jumps over the pits perfectly in this latest action game. The winning of Sir Bottomtight will depend up how bravely he fights against the cannibals.

You can also buy new weapons, idol magnet and your power-ups with the help of golden masks. Track how many masks and power-ups you have earned so far by looking at the top left corner of the screen in this HTML5 shooting game! Initially, you find out the difficulty in controlling the character, but mastery will come only when you give it some time. If you are stuck, do not forget to go through our wider collection of free arcade games and spot some new fun and thrilling opportunities.

game.mobileControlKeys: TOUCH AND DRAG THE BALL TO AIM, RELESE TO THROW THE GOLE
game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS L CLICK PF MOUSE AND DRAG TO SELECT THE TARGET, RELESE TO HIT THE BALL
